text: Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne. Jekopu nagakura ranke huta muse zagamera huzmanteho. Ana vahe'mo'za maka vahera zamagatere'naza vahe mani'naze. Hagi ranke huta Nagri nagima musema huta husgama hanazana amanage hiho, Ra Anumzamoka, Israeli vaheka'a osi'ama ofri mani'naza vahera zamagu vazinka zamavro huta hiho.
